Summary: The orb moved then abruptly stopped then stayed stationary then moved up sideways then flew up into the sky really fast
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Firebaugh
There were no other sightings in Firebaugh on or around May 1st 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at the apricot inn on my way to yucca valley I looked at the sun and saw the orb it was hovering then moved then stopped went sideways and then at incrible speed went into the sky
